1:
CIRCULAR NO. 32 / 2003 
 
 
 
Shri Tarlochan Singh, Chairperson , National Commission for 
Minorities will be given due courtesy during his journey by air. However, he 
is not exempt from pre-embarkation security check. All security staff of 
Airport Security Unit may please be informed accordingly. This is issued in 
supersession of this Bureau Circular of even no. dated 19-11-2003 
 
 
(R K. Singh) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security(CA) 
 
 
 
Ref : No. CAS- CAS-7(9)/2003.DIV-1  dated 31 Dec 2003
